1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: A police called Poyraz Karayel gets prison sentence because of an allegation and loses custody of his son. After his penalty, he becomes a cab driver with the help of his old chief Mumtaz. But also he has an another job: following Bahri Umman, who is the head of one of the biggest mafia families of Istanbul. One day, Poyraz fails to get his son while he was driving his cab and the incident ends in police. Meanwhile, he meets Aysegul.

imdb.title: Poyraz Karayel
plot: A defamed ex-cop, who is struggling to get back his son, is put on undercover duty within the biggest mafia in Istanbul.::ahmetkozan
